column4: what is the difference between java jdk and jre. Which one do I need to run jedit on ubuntu?
You need both but the difference is that using JDK you can develop and you can run the program only if you have the JRE
so why do I need both? For running it don't I need only jre?
yes ofcourse you can have only JRE for because Jedit is as same as JDK in wndows
yes! But jedit is more powerful than JDK in windows according to my knowledge
